problem_text_cn: 如图,相邻两根电杆都用钢索在地面上固定,一根电杆钢索系在离地面4m处,另一根电杆钢索系在离地面6m处,则中间两根钢索相交处点P离地面()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the two adjacent poles are fixed on the ground with steel cables. One pole cable is tied at N_0 from the ground, the other pole cable is tied at N_1 from the ground, and the two steel cables in the middle The cable intersection point P is off the ground ()
